content:
You can sign up online and pay the deposit to secure your spot.

**What to Bring:**

To get the most out of the "Stress Less, Breathe More" workshop, please bring the following:

1. **Yoga mat:** Bring a comfortable yoga mat to practice on. If you don't have one, you can rent one at the studio for $2.
2. **Comfortable clothing:** Wear loose, comfortable clothing that allows for a full range of motion.
3. **Water bottle:** Stay hydrated throughout the workshop by bringing a refillable water bottle.
4. **Blanket or throw:** If you tend to get chilly during relaxation practices, bring a blanket or throw to keep warm.
5. **Journal and pen:** You may want to take notes or reflect on your experience during the workshop, so bring a journal and pen.
6. **An open mind:** Come with an open mind and a willingness to learn and explore new techniques for managing stress and anxiety.

**What's Provided:**

Pilgrimage Yoga will provide:

1. **Yoga props:** Blocks, straps, and bolsters will be available for use during the workshop.
2. **Mats and blankets:** If you don't have a yoga mat, you can rent one at the studio. They'll also have blankets available for use during relaxation practices.
3. **Tea and water:** Complimentary tea and water will be available throughout the workshop.
4. **Expert guidance:** The workshop will be led by experienced instructors who will guide you through the practices and provide individualized attention as needed.

**Arrival and Parking:**

Please arrive 10-15 minutes before the workshop starts to allow time to check in and get settled. There's limited parking available in the studio's parking lot, but you can also park on the surrounding streets or use public parking options nearby.

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to Pilgrimage Yoga directly or ask me!
